tool_description:
Realtime APIs support entire shopping flow on Target.com.
(Free trial enabled)
name: Target.com Shopping - API
title: Target.com Shopping - API

api_list.name: product_details
api_list.description:
Returns detailed product information.
Including:
```
product variants (with different dimension like size, color and etc.
ratings and reviews
item images/videos
price
promotion
child products
```

required_parameters.name: store_id
required_parameters.description:
The id of the store which product details data is being retrieved from. (Required, CANNOT be empty)
Value comes from nearby store API.

Example: 3330

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description:
Target product id.
Value comes from product search API.

api_list.name: product_fulfillment

required_parameters.name: tcin
required_parameters.description:
Target product id.
Value comes from product search API.

optional_parameters.name: state
optional_parameters.description: State code where is user is located at. (optional)

optional_parameters.name: store_id
optional_parameters.description:
The id of the Target store from which the fulfillment information is being retrieved.
Value comes from nearby stores api.
(optional)

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description:
The zipcode of user's search location.
(optional)

api_list.name: product_search
api_list.description: Returns the list of products based on keyword.

api_list.name: nearby_stores
api_list.description: Returns the list of stores near to specified ZIP code.

optional_parameters.name: within
optional_parameters.description: Radius of searching distance in miles

api_list.name: search_autocomplete
api_list.description: Product autocompletion based on search keyword.
